Итак, Back 4 Blood, конечно, весёлая игра. Но эта честнее, без технических недоработок и снижения цены в три раза через пару месяцев.

Update: Но в б4б фиксят, сейчас уже почти всё без трабл :) Можете в неё тож играть уже)
Used to play it on the 360 with my dad for 100s of hours. Now I play it occasionally with friends, still a fun pass time

*Good FPS Zombie shooter game with brickshitting horrifying background music.
*Zoey is cute as hell!
*You can destroy zombies hordes!
*AI in this game is helpful. 
*Don't disturb witches please don't or you can if have balls to.
*Explosives are game changer always pick them up.

Es un juego con mecánicas bastantes simples lo que lo vuelve fácil de comprender y a su vez bastante entretenido ademas su multijugador te permite disfrutar de este exquisito juego con hasta 4 amigos!!
Na minha opinião, o melhor co-op de todos!

Не люблю игры про зомби но эта мне зашла. Игра 2009 года но графика топовая. Очень классно можно провести время с друзьями убивая зомби. 10/10

Still just as fun as it was in 2008, this game is timeless and super cheap to boot. I highly recommend it for anyone who enjoys co-op multiplayer, and if you have a group of friends then it is even more fun.

Addicting, weird but kind of relaxing at the same time, definitely a bubble gum game to zone out too. Good soup

This is a classic first person action game in which different factors go towards your death. This game is incredibly great and should be played more by other users. people play the second because it has many of the same factors and more than this game, but it is a classic and should still be played regularly, despite it's aged appearance. I recommend this game, I have enjoyed it very much, and I hope the rest of you do too.

This is definitely one of Valve's masterpieces! Unlike most zombie shooters now-a-days, every time you play the maps, items are rarely found in the same place twice so it encourages you to explore, it has an in-game directer which throws in more zombies and special infected if you are smashing the levels or lays of a bit with the zombies if you are struggling and the one-liners are iconic like, "What the hell are you doin' Francis!". Definitely a shooter worth picking up!

It's still epic nowadays. : D
Though the campaigns are already included in the sequel,it's still more difficult.
Just don't be alone or u will regret
